languages.text: "Да. Лучше всего — подальше от чужих глаз и ушей".
"Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."
languages.original_text: "Да. Лучше всего — подальше от чужих глаз и ушей".

traits.locale_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

traits.locale_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

languages.text: «Sí. Es una conversación que más vale tener lejos de ojos y oídos curiosos».
languages.original_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Es una conversación que más vale tener lejos de ojos y oídos curiosos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ。できれば人の目や耳に触れない場所で話したい」
languages.original_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ。できれば人の目や耳に触れない場所で話したい」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “没错，这些事情最好能找个避人耳目的地方谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

traits.locale_text: “没错，这些事情最好能找个避人耳目的地方谈谈。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « En effet. Il s'agit d'une conversation qu'il vaut mieux avoir à l'abri des regards et des oreilles indiscrets. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Il s'agit d'une conversation qu'il vaut mieux avoir à l'abri des regards et des oreilles indiscrets. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Das ist eine Unterhaltung, die wir lieber fern neugieriger Augen und Ohren führen sollten."
languages.original_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Das ist eine Unterhaltung, die wir lieber fern neugieriger Augen und Ohren führen sollten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

languages.text: "Tamam. Bu konuşmayı başkalarının yanında yapmamamız daha iyi olur."
languages.original_text: "Yes. This is a conversation best had away from prying eyes and ears."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Bu konuşmayı başkaları varken yapmasak daha uygun olur."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
